mentor:
Dear <name>,

Atal Innovation Mission is pleased to announce the launch of ATL InnoNET (Innovation Networking and Mentoring Platform), an endeavour to help the students and ATL schools to connect with mentors who will coach and motivate the next generation to tinker and innovate. Please find the link to ATL InnoNet and your login details for the same below
 
Platform link - http://atlinnonet.gov.in
Login ID – <username>
Password – <password>

Please login and connect to the network to begin mentoring.

Thank You,
AIM Team.
